description: As satellite launches ramp up and the spacecraft clog the skies, astronomers fear for their data.
title: 50 years ago, satellites threatened astronomers’ view of the cosmos

description: Editor in chief Nancy Shute celebrates this year's SN10: Scientists to Watch and novel approaches to research.
title: Embracing the collective nature of science

description: In control A high dose of the psychedelic psilocybin temporarily dissolves brain networks, Laura Sanders reported in “Psilocybin erases brain ‘fingerprints’” (SN: 8/10/24, p. 12). In the study, a generic form of the stimulant Ritalin served as a control against psilocybin. Reader Jason Patrick asked why scientists chose that drug. It can be hard to […]
title: Readers discuss the psychedelic psilocybin, frogs and UFOs
